column2: The Scoia'tael have risen up in [Root.GetName] led by a veteran non-human. The squirrels have the nerve to demand independence!
The Scoia'tael have risen up in [Root.GetName] led by a veteran non-human. The squirrels have the nerve to demand independence!
Even more squirrels have risen up in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
